original_title: Three persons drown off Negombo beach
original_body_lines: Three persons who went swimming in the sea off the Pattukala beach in  Negombo were reported missing this afternoon and are believed to have drowned.
Police said the missing persons aged 20 and 23 are residents of the Chunnakam, Koslanda and Diagama areas.
Investigations revealed that the missing persons are a group of employees working in the Katunayake BOI Zone.
Police lifeguards, navy diving teams and local residents are conducting search operations to find the missing persons.
